articles.title: Ford Takes $19.5 Billion EV Hit. Is the EV Revolution Over?
articles.mainIdea: Ford Takes $19.5 Billion EV Hit. Is the EV Revolution Over?
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Ford Takes $19.5 Billion EV Hit. Is the EV Revolution Over?. Electric vehicles were supposed to disrupt the auto industry, but sales are down, subsidies are going away, and Ford is pivoting away from EVs and taking $19.5 billion in charges to shift to hybrids. What strategy is the right one long-term? Related tickers mentioned: RIVN, TSLA.

articles.title: 2025: The year the Big 3 backed away from EVs
articles.mainIdea: 2025: The year the Big 3 backed away from EVs
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance: 2025: The year the Big 3 backed away from EVs. The Big Three automakers — Ford, GM, and Stellantis — have been caught in the crosshairs of a demand slump as they move away from massive EV investments and strategies, possibly leaving themselves on the back foot if EV demand increases. Related tickers mentioned: GM, STLA, TSLA.

articles.summary: Zacks: Investors Heavily Search Ford Motor Company (F): Here is What You Need to Know. Zacks.com users have recently been watching Ford Motor (F) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects. Related tickers mentioned: ^GSPC.
